long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool to help you quickly replicate characters created on Character AI to other platforms. It facilitates better dissemination of your creative ideas and enables easy management and synchronization of characters across multiple platforms. 

Operating steps: 
1. Install this Chrome extension. 
2. Visit the Talkie web（https://www.talkie-ai.com/） platform and log in. 
3. Visit Character.ai（https://character.ai/） and complete the login. 
4. Click on the plugin to open it, then click the sync button to synchronize.

For your attention： 
1. We request host permissions for Character AI and Talkie AI primarily to obtain your cookies from these platforms. This facilitates seamless information synchronization across multiple sites for you. 
2. To assist you in automatically accessing character-related information created in Character AI and facilitate automatic synchronization to other platforms, we need to obtain your cookies for batch processing. 
3. We can confirm that the cookies obtained will only be used once to synchronize information and will not be stored, leaked, or used for any other purposes.
